page.title: 14PEOPLE
page.content: A lot of people have{employment}away in London, Chelmsford and other biggish places. But the people who work in the area mostly work on a farm and in pubs. We talked to Mrs. Burr who has lived in the village for a long time. She went to{Ford End school.}She remembered when she could play in the road when there was no traffic but now we can not because there is a great deal of traffic. There are a few old people in Ford End village that we can find information from Mrs.Burr has lived in the village all her life.
